pullRequest.title: fix(e2e): Fix timing issue in provisioning e2e tests
pullRequest.bodyText: There is some propagation delay between when a device is provisioned to a hub and when it is queryable. This commit refactors the test to just query for the device until it can be found, rather than just query once and hope the device was ready to be queried.

commit.message:
fix(e2e): Fix timing issue in provisioning e2e tests

There is some propagation delay between when a device is provisioned to a hub and when it is queryable. This commit refactors the test to just query for the device until it can be found, rather than just query once and hope the device was ready to be queried.

nodes.bodyText: Doesn't this add delay of more than 4 minutes our tests where we keep querying to see if device is provisioned?
